scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && npx concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:fast: npm run kill-ports && npx concurrently "npm run dev:api:fast" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:ultra: npm run kill-ports && npx concurrently "npm run dev:api:ultra" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:unsafe: npx concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:safe: npm run kill-ports && npx concurrently "npm run dev:api:safe" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:client"
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
